about_the_game:
"Starfinder RPG - Starfinder Flip-Mat - Amusement Park


Step Right Up! Hurry, hurry, hurry!

Come test your skills at one of many carnival games or experience the thrills of a looping hovercoaster! It's all waiting for a group of heroes who are on a well-earned vacation or are investigating mysterious goings-on just under the cheerful surface. These maps features a small carnival midway, and a small section of a much larger (and much cleaner) theme park. Starfinder Flip-Mats present ready-to-use science-fantasy set pieces for the busy Game Master. With Starfinder Flip-Mat: Amusement Park, you'll be ready for the next time your players want to unwind!

NOTE:  This product has been made specifically for the Starfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Pathfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds

This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:

  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
